amendment.description: Amendment sought to zero out the HIV research RDT&E funding under the Department of the Army by striking the amount of $22,796,000 and applying the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in the Congressional Record to transfer $22,796,000 from from Research Development, Test and Evaluation to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A008) Failed by voice vote.
